articles.title: Cold weather alert across England as 'snow moon' set to delight sky-gazers - Sky News
articles.content:
As a 48-hour cold snap is expected to grip the whole of England, sky-gazers hope to catch a glimpse of a so-called snow moon over the next three days.
A weather warning has been issued until 6pm on … [+1987 chars]

articles.title: A Planet Almost Exactly Earth's Size Has Been Found 72 Light-Years Away - ScienceAlert
articles.description: We've just found an exoplanet almost exactly the same size as Earth orbiting a tiny star not very far away at all.
articles.content:
We've just found an exoplanet almost exactly the same size as Earth orbiting a tiny star not very far away at all.
It's called K2-415b, and its similarities (and differences) to our own home world m… [+4820 chars]

articles.title: Jupiter Overtakes Saturn as The Planet With The Most Known Moons - ScienceAlert

articles.content:
The battle for the most known moons in the Solar System is raging on.
